hadiths.text: It was narrated that Aisha said:"The Messenger of Allah(ﷺ)used to pray at night while I was lying down sleeping between him and the Qibla on his bed. When he wanted to pray witr he would wake me up and I would pray witr

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ خَلْفَ النَّائِمِ
chapter.eng-name: The concession allowing praying behind one who is sleeping
